General.Name: Tempus Resources Ltd
General.Description: Tempus Resources Limited engages in the mineral exploration business in Canada and Ecuador. Its flagship project is the Blackdome-Elizabeth Gold project covering an area of 315 square kilometres located in Southern British Columbia, Canada. The company was incorporated in 2018 and is based in Perth, Australia.
